item.description:
I will bring my matte cutter - you bring your matte boards, frames, and artwork - together we can put together a professional presentation of your work! Perfect time to finish up your pieces for gift-giving or redecorating your own space. (part two of this open studio will take place December 20th. We could use today to consult about colors, size, and planning for your final cutting and framing. There are some great techniques to refurbish old or plain frames and make them new and exciting. Prep your materials, give them time to dry and return on the 20th to finalize your project.)

You may also treat this as a regular open studio time and bring whatever project you might be working on. Plenty of space for everyone!

WHAT TO BRING: Matte boards, frames, photographs, artwork, or simply bring your basic art kit, and any project you'd like to work on...journaling, ATCs, altered books...and there's inspiration to spare, if that's what you need!

DAY/TIME: Thursday, December 6th from 7:30-10:30 p.m.

AMENITIES: Free parking. A/C. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, some aprons, etc.). Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom.

COST: $10 to defray cost for the space.Â  This is an open studio event.

WHO MAY ATTEND: Anyone, but you must sign up on the NE ATC+ Meetup site (which requires joining that group; it's free with no obligation).

HOW TO SIGN UP: Reserve a place by RSVP-ing "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function. Please RSVP for your guests as well.

If your plans (or your guests' plans) change, PLEASE update your RSVP accordingly. Please do this right up to the start time of the event.

CANCELLATIONS: In the unlikely event that we need to cancel---or even if we're just getting a late start--we'll post a message on the Web site and e-mail everyone who's RSVP'd "yes." So to be on the safe side, please check the Web site and your inbox before departing for ArtStudio 360.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Studio Time: Framer's Workshop, part 1
